title: Emergency Lifted as President revokes proclamation
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st):  Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has revoked the proclamation on Public Emergency with effect from midnight on 5th April 2022.
Investigation into Police, Army Riders confrontation during protest near parliament
Police confront armed masked men in unregistered bikes at parliament protest
42 Sri Lankan lawmakers go independent ; Govt majority in limbo
Customs clarifies armed escort video; says radioactive material was re-exported
